author: prbuzz.com
title: Free Desktop Publishing Software Brings More Flexibility to Digital Publishing
text:
FlipBuilder, the desktop publishing solutions provider, has recently promoted online publishing software Flip PDF which allows users to easily create and publish flip books online. Compatible with Windows and Mac, the desktop publishing software is available for free.
According to the CEO of FlipBuilder, Winston Zhang, “The Flip PDF software is the realization of every publisher’s dream of easy and hassle-free software, which has been created to help them design and upload innovative web publishing content”. The rise in innovative content publishing has led to the introduction of various desktop publishing softwares .However; they are not always easy to use, affordable or with innovative features.
Flip PDF by FlipBuilder is a complete publishing solution which allows web publishers to make their innovative ideas a reality. Apart from allowing a beautiful outlook through numerous designing options which are as simple to apply as drag and drop, the software also allows more interactive content publishing with animations and videos. Paired with a super easy and unique designing feature, this free publishing software mac allows users to customize their content by offering multiple options to import pages, content and PDF files.
Whether it is a magazine, brochure, catalog, e-book or a photo book, making a digital flipbook is now an easy task. Publishing options enable users to share these flip-look books on social networks, in emails or simply uploading online. The software acknowledges the endless array of gadgets available today and makes the content easy to read on i-pads, iPhones or any other mobile device. A comprehensive demo on how to use flip PDF is available on the official website of Flipbuilder.
In a nutshell, Flip PDF helps publishers create and share flipbooks online with absolute ease. The numerous innovative features, diversified publishing options, free download facility and easy to use interface make it a sure winner over other desktop publishing software in the market.
